description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have officially tied the knot, multiple sources are reporting.据数位知情人士透露，约翰尼·德普与安珀已经正式结婚了。

According to People, the couple married at their Los Angeles home Tuesday. E! News has confirmed this, as well as Us Weekly. 《People》杂志报道，这对新人于本周二在两人位于洛杉矶的府邸中举行了婚礼。《E! News》和 《Us Weekly》两家杂志也确证了这一消息。

According to all three outlets, a bigger ceremony is set to take place on Depp's private island in the Bahamas this weekend.根据上述三方报道，两人这周末将在德普所有的巴哈马私人岛屿上举行一场更隆重的典礼。

Depp, 51, and Heard, 28, met on the set of the 2011 thriller "The Rum Diary." The pair was first romantically linked in 2012, and news of their engagement broke in January 2014, after Heard was spotted wearing an engagement ring.51岁的德普与28岁的安珀在2011年因为共同拍摄惊悚片《莱姆酒日记》而相互结识。两人在2012年开始缔结恋爱关系，2014年1月间赫德被人看到带着订婚戒指，由此爆出二人订婚的消息。

The "Pirates of the Caribbean" star indirectly confirmed the engagement news to the Associated Press in March 2014, saying, "The fact that I'm wearing a chick's ring on my finger is probably a dead giveaway -- not very subtle," lifting up his hand to reveal a diamond band.2014年3月间，这位《加勒比海盗》中的明星向美联社委婉的承认了两人订婚的消息。他说“我正带着一位女郎给我的戒指，这是赤裸裸的事实，直接了当的暴露了秘密——一点也不隐晦。”他说着还抬起手，露出一枚钻石戒指。

The wedding marks Heard's first marriage and Depp's second. The actor married makeup artist Lori Allison in 1983 before they separated two years later. Depp has two children with his former girlfriend Vanessa Paradis: Lily-Rose, 15, and Jack, 12.这场婚礼标志着赫德的第一次婚姻、同是也是德普的第二次婚姻。这位男演员曾在1983年和化妆师洛丽·艾莉森结婚，两年后离婚。德普和他的前女友凡妮莎·帕拉迪丝有两名子女：15岁的莉莉-罗丝和12岁的杰克。

Congratulations to the newlyweds!恭喜这对新人！
